anime.name: Tonkatsu DJ Agetarou
anime.synopsis:
Being the heir of a tonkatsu (breaded pork cutlet) restaurant running for three generations, young Agetar≈ç Katsumata works at the family business daily under his father's supervision but with little motivation. One day he stumbled into a nightclub in the neighborhood and soon discovered the similarities of rhythmic moves between cooking tonkatsu and being a disc jockey.

(Source: ANN)
